tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE public_opinion_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  public_policy_issue TEXT,
  public_opinion TEXT,
  sentiment_analysis TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE public_opinion_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    political_affiliation VARCHAR(50),
    opinion_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    public_opinion_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE policy_advocates (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    organization VARCHAR(100),
    contact_email VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE policy_advocacy_logs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    advocate_id INT,
    policy_id INT,
    action_taken TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE advocacy_actions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_description TEXT,
    action_date DATE,
    group_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (group_id) REFERENCES advocacy_groups(group_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sentiment_analysis_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_date DATE,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    opinion_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (opinion_id) REFERENCES public_opinion_data(id)
);
